name: THE HARVESTING
description:
"It appeared one day, out of nowhere. It stared at us all, watching, waving... smiling... We don't know what it is, we don't know what it will do, but one thing is for certain....

It is dangerous to be left there..."

CONCEPT:

The Harvesting is a 2D shooter game where you play as a piece of wheat and your goal is to survive all the farmers that are coming to harvest you.

You accomplish this by shooting out pieces of wheat to kill the farmers that plan on taking your livelihood from you once again.

The game consists of 4 levels to go through and endure, with moderate difficulty scaling up as you go.

CONTROLS:

Left Click - Shoot Projectile

Right Click - Move (Only Works On Pieces Of Farmland)

Escape - Opens The Pause Menu

***The rest of the controls will be present on screen.***
